{"United_Kingdom":[{"regret":"Being too shy with the girls","gender":"","id":"R_9S9At46suDF2cn3","date":"2020-05-05T19:08:56Z","location":{"country":"United Kingdom","state":"England"}},{"regret":"Persevering with an extremely unhealthy relationship (where I was all too willing to accept responsibility for us both and she was unwilling to take responsibility for her own wellbeing, and I was unable to deal with this disparity in a healthy way) to the point where I became abusive and was subsequently convicted of three charges relating to domestic abuse. I regret this both in terms of the harm I perpetrated and the consequences for me.","gender":"","id":"R_bI7OqYvFrwRaq0Z","date":"2019-09-04T17:38:49Z","location":{"country":"United Kingdom","state":"Scotland"}},{"regret":"I did not persist at university and in early adulthood with creative writing","gender":"","id":"R_d07aaDpT62JeAKh","date":"2019-07-24T11:30:20Z","location":{"country":"United Kingdom","state":"England"}},{"regret":"That I chose partners whose lives I could make better instead of choosing a partner who would make my life better","gender":"","id":"R_0kVyqtM1lHFoTwp","date":"2019-07-23T15:08:42Z","location":{"country":"United Kingdom","state":"England"}},{"regret":"I didn't learn to speak fluently in another language","gender":"","id":"R_ehu7p06NaR72aZT","date":"2019-07-15T16:54:37Z","location":{"country":"United Kingdom","state":"England"}}],"Arkansas":[{"regret":"Not finding love in time to be able to have kids before I had lost my ability through hysterectomy.","gender":"","id":"R_5p3iLuda1tgbGNn","date":"2020-04-26T13:24:56Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arkansas"}}],"Michigan":[{"regret":"Believing that it's always psychologically benign to think about any intellectual idea in any situation. 
(including before bed, while listening to friends, while playing basketball, after thinking about it for long enough, etc)","gender":"","id":"R_0xsL1tvY4DKp0jj","date":"2019-11-23T05:07:50Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Michigan"}},{"regret":"Not following God's prompting when considering dating a guy (I did and wish I never had) as well as accepting the job I currently work at. In hindsight, I can see how doing both of these things ended up being the wrong decision. Thankfully, I learned and the 3rd time, listened and obeyed. (I canceled surgery for an issue that seems to be healed.)","gender":"","id":"R_8csrJJQFDdhhJ09","date":"2019-08-26T23:59:45Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Michigan"}},{"regret":"not finishing my MBA","gender":"","id":"R_9ADI59hvjPAyJh3","date":"2019-07-19T20:39:56Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Michigan"}},{"regret":"When younger, making decisions based on someone else's fear","gender":"","id":"R_bfGEsksBrfwMds9","date":"2019-06-24T21:12:03Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Michigan"}}],"Oman":[{"regret":"Be more outspoken , mingle with family friends","gender":"","id":"R_0qg3T0HWMzioLSl","date":"2019-11-05T21:45:09Z","location":{"country":"Oman","state":"Masqat"}}],"California":[{"regret":"That I didn't travel or have more fun when I was in my late twenties. I was so focused on achieving at work, getting married, and having kids, that I wouldn't make time to take adventures.","gender":"","id":"R_6th4gvXKOzJBV9b","date":"2019-10-20T02:33:03Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"California"}},{"regret":"Wasted 2 yrs of my life with someone non committal.  But not to worry I am married and found someone much better.","gender":"","id":"R_5AykhHvZF6dTsP3","date":"2019-08-31T16:14:18Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"California"}},{"regret":"I have let work interfere with my fitness & health... closely followed by spending money on random crap to soothe work stress.... do you sense a theme?  :)
thanks Dan!","gender":"","id":"R_5tGOi1mRWngtNRj","date":"2019-07-21T19:20:20Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"California"}},{"regret":"Not studying abroad in college.","gender":"","id":"R_3KwYbW4cAyryocZ","date":"2019-07-21T07:07:14Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"California"}},{"regret":"Not visiting my parents/grandparents more when they were alive.","gender":"","id":"R_e8uyKfUxVyIWWeF","date":"2019-07-17T21:29:02Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"California"}}],"Brazil":[{"regret":"I wish I had been more careful with my body","gender":"","id":"R_789eqOtX28ZyHel","date":"2019-10-15T16:36:19Z","location":{"country":"Brazil","state":"Minas Gerais"}},{"regret":"I regret not travelling enough and more often while married, alone with each one, and all together as group, with my four kids (Mike age 43, Ilana age 40, Julia age 18 and David age 14) in order to dive into their private dreams and fullfillments.  Anyway I am their proud father and still get inspired by them.","gender":"","id":"R_cGi7deNFxiFFVpH","date":"2019-06-24T17:18:34Z","location":{"country":"Brazil","state":"São Paulo"}}],"Utah":[{"regret":"The way I ended my marriage","gender":"","id":"R_3rf1CFWbrv8zPlX","date":"2019-10-04T19:59:23Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Utah"}},{"regret":"Not fully appreciating and enjoying the period of life when my children were young.","gender":"","id":"R_3xxnTAVnavp81yR","date":"2019-08-15T16:53:42Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Utah"}},{"regret":"Not insisting my education was as valuable as my (ex) husband's. It put my start in college back two decades. I wish I'd learned earlier that I could have made it a requirement of the marriage, because so much else important turned out to be related to valuing my education.","gender":"","id":"R_cP8ElobqES0UGbj","date":"2019-06-28T13:46:01Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Utah"}}],"Texas":[{"regret":"not getting my doctorate sooner","gender":"","id":"R_aaxJ4BZRQolL0TX","date":"2019-09-13T23:38:44Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Texas"}},{"regret":"Not committing to one thing long enough to master it.","gender":"","id":"R_9FZt07fmBDEJDQV","date":"2019-07-08T18:39:06Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Texas"}},{"regret":"Being passive for far too long.  Embrace the fear and move on.","gender":"","id":"R_6XtRZxPsyD3vdsh","date":"2019-07-02T18:35:55Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Texas"}},{"regret":"I wish I had spent more time with my grandmother before she died. In the end, she wanted the freedom of death and that was such a scary and sad thing to me that I ran away from it and avoided her. I regret that I didn't have the courage to accept her where she was and be a companion anyway.","gender":"","id":"R_08k4trg2gEN6TFX","date":"2019-07-01T20:51:01Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Texas"}},{"regret":"My biggest regret is succumbing to my lack of confidence and emotional instability in college. I didn't seek the right kind of help and it made for a miserable four years. It could have been SO DIFFERENT and I could have taken a much different career path that was  more fulfilling much sooner in my life.","gender":"","id":"R_0JsgOCo1Xqtd3yR","date":"2019-06-30T01:43:13Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Texas"}}],"New_York":[{"regret":"Not sticking with my original undergraduate college choice and instead ending up at 4 different schools before I graduated. I feel no connection to my alma mater and have no lifelong college friendships.","gender":"","id":"R_0kwh5UwQ1hRwXzf","date":"2019-08-30T18:37:48Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New York"}},{"regret":"Not accepting sooner that my depression and anxiety couldn't be cured, but could be adapted to in ways that allowed me to do work I care about and remain close to people I love.","gender":"","id":"R_9FGh10onPSt5Fpb","date":"2019-07-03T19:12:28Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New York"}},{"regret":"It's difficult to regret something because I know everything led me to where I am now. For example, I might regret that I was so inconsiderate while making plans to travel around the world, resulting in my boyfriend breaking up with me. But then I might not ever have moved to South Korea, and I believe I would have regretted never fulfilling a dream to live abroad. 
I guess my biggest regret would be stressing over things that already happened and getting upset/anxious. Feeling bad about choices I already made. It doesn't feel good, and it doesn't help. It’s a waste of time and energy, and it distracts from enjoying the present moment. Better to look at the experience with love and forgiveness, and figure out if there's anything to be learned.","gender":"","id":"R_3kmNQgRO80S9fvf","date":"2019-07-01T04:24:10Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New York"}},{"regret":"Not going 'away' to college. i was a commuter and worked full-time from freshman year of college all the way through grad school. i would i could have taken time to just be a student.","gender":"","id":"R_5hUwhfh0iECDlkh","date":"2019-06-28T20:35:46Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New York"}},{"regret":"I wish I’d had more children","gender":"","id":"R_7VXn0IFoNWZzAaN","date":"2019-06-27T02:52:33Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New York"}}],"Australia":[{"regret":"Anything I have said or when I didn't listen and this hurt someone.  Especially the times I was judgemental and wanted to be right.","gender":"","id":"R_0rncT4sGXhNIhhP","date":"2019-08-28T03:10:55Z","location":{"country":"Australia","state":"New South Wales"}},{"regret":"Not taking more chances.","gender":"","id":"R_3aw9Ej0OF2jYnSB","date":"2019-07-16T03:50:02Z","location":{"country":"Australia","state":"ACT"}},{"regret":"Missing my sons appointment to school captain of his grade school for work","gender":"","id":"R_3qIIqjQNWcsBPkF","date":"2019-06-27T04:48:11Z","location":{"country":"Australia","state":"New South Wales"}},{"regret":"Believing the world lives by my standards.","gender":"","id":"R_1TdLrekVQ5Y6jFX","date":"2019-06-26T05:01:07Z","location":{"country":"Australia","state":"New South Wales"}}],"Philippines":[{"regret":"Involving myself in a cause with others without any real blood relatives onboard.","gender":"","id":"R_b8jSQM0mGyl6ptr","date":"2019-08-27T03:27:25Z","location":{"country":"Philippines","state":"Eastern Samar"}}],"Arizona":[{"regret":"Falling in love with someone else when I was married to another person.","gender":"","id":"R_8CH1MVK7lgvQ9Ux","date":"2019-08-26T19:09:20Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arizona"}},{"regret":"I regret being constantly over-committed during my working years, being too busy to spend time at home with my family and generally enjoy life and health. I think it was a way to avoid being responsible for my choices. Now that I'm retired, I'm going slower and enjoying life more, but it is hard to overcome life-long habits.","gender":"","id":"R_7afpIZADRjcDOhn","date":"2019-07-15T18:29:49Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arizona"}},{"regret":"Not taking more risks earlier in life - exploring the world, meeting more people, following my heart into adventures that didn't "fit the box".","gender":"","id":"R_2ohW4STq2aoWT0p","date":"2019-07-01T16:33:14Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arizona"}},{"regret":"I wish I would have studied abroad in college","gender":"","id":"R_7V5lsKTAN7QAugd","date":"2019-06-28T05:47:34Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arizona"}},{"regret":"I didn't study abroad in college","gender":"","id":"R_4PI5l3hQB7aE7Jz","date":"2019-06-27T16:48:22Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Arizona"}}],"Minnesota":[{"regret":"Making decisions based on what I TRULY wanted.","gender":"","id":"R_1OnPMt4azfIBogJ","date":"2019-08-22T20:35:30Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Minnesota"}},{"regret":"Not taking a timeout to spend time with the important people in my life. I have had a tendency to place work responsibilities ahead of my family and others.","gender":"","id":"R_3BICIO29uPZRA2h","date":"2019-08-19T02:23:37Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Minnesota"}},{"regret":"Agreed with my spouse to join with spouse's siblings in a family business endeavor. Sibs recently forced us out.","gender":"","id":"R_2a6bi33rpMBKGeV","date":"2019-07-22T19:01:49Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Minnesota"}},{"regret":"Going to (and failing out of) college right out of high school when I didn't want to be in school. Taking out student loans during the time I didn't want to be in college.","gender":"","id":"R_7PUu7UHtr1NcjUV","date":"2019-07-11T23:08:20Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Minnesota"}},{"regret":"I accepted a job as an advancement in my career but it involved moving my family and leaving a company I had grown up in.  The new company and area was a mistake for both me and my family and we moved back less than three years later to an area we love but it took an even longer time to get to back to job satisfaction.","gender":"","id":"R_3BMKH1HRoEy3flb","date":"2019-07-07T04:35:47Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Minnesota"}}],"Georgia":[{"regret":"NOT leaving my previous job sooner.","gender":"","id":"R_4ZRCn5Co45qZfiR","date":"2019-08-06T04:30:38Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Georgia"}},{"regret":"Never found Mr Right","gender":"","id":"R_6xMJq4F83ez4cYt","date":"2019-07-10T05:38:00Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Georgia"}},{"regret":"That I didn't go to film school.","gender":"","id":"R_7Une9jtZO1UJnU1","date":"2019-07-02T03:25:31Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Georgia"}},{"regret":"I regret not having pursued getting a Master's and PhD before having a family.  I thought I was too busy with my career, I had no idea.","gender":"","id":"R_8k2uuo8NmPY8uON","date":"2019-06-27T16:23:40Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Georgia"}},{"regret":"I wish i had been able to stay home longer when my boys were little.","gender":"","id":"R_a5wSHGAt0hNREPz","date":"2019-06-24T18:48:02Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Georgia"}}],"Illinois":[{"regret":"Staying in relationships too long","gender":"","id":"R_cU8YepSgIM5nsbP","date":"2019-08-05T19:32:33Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Illinois"}},{"regret":"Not studying abroad in college","gender":"","id":"R_b1mnGWMZWFpbF0F","date":"2019-08-01T03:15:56Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Illinois"}},{"regret":"Not studying abroad while I was in college.","gender":"","id":"R_79xvrq2OWzsDAMd","date":"2019-07-15T01:46:38Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Illinois"}},{"regret":"I wish I had been more adventurous when I was a young adult, and been more confident - maybe traveled or studied abroad.","gender":"","id":"R_eaj5BkSYfnoe0AZ","date":"2019-06-28T22:29:34Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Illinois"}},{"regret":"I regret not taking the time and effort to plan out a career path before choosing a major (and minor) in college. My current career has nothing to do with either and I'm constantly wondering if I should go back to university to start over in something I am actually passionate about or stick with the safe paycheck to be sure my family is taken care of.","gender":"","id":"R_03zIlZYBGGv69Cd","date":"2019-06-25T16:56:22Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Illinois"}}],"Virginia":[{"regret":"marriage","gender":"","id":"R_9SrabGkif95VYQR","date":"2019-08-05T19:13:37Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Virginia"}},{"regret":"Automatically doing what I thought was expected of me, rather than considering what I actually needed to feel happy and fulfilled.","gender":"","id":"R_38ZsaOBUdxzYy7X","date":"2019-07-10T17:58:57Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Virginia"}},{"regret":"I wish I had applied myself more in high school. It may have impacted where I went school, my chosen career, and even where I lived and who I married.","gender":"","id":"R_cISGNAUPY3z68f3","date":"2019-07-10T17:14:48Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Virginia"}},{"regret":"Having better relationships - with my family and finding that one person to share the rest of your life with.","gender":"","id":"R_0oXy3jr12w8gVx3","date":"2019-07-08T16:38:22Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Virginia"}},{"regret":"Caring too much what others think of me","gender":"","id":"R_8CUrGQICMb5TiL3","date":"2019-07-05T16:01:34Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Virginia"}}],"Colorado":[{"regret":"Letting others tell me who I should be rather than discovering myself out sooner.","gender":"","id":"R_5A3mRUv3iECma8t","date":"2019-08-01T05:33:48Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Colorado"}},{"regret":"not having kids","gender":"","id":"R_1z6ZzGxRpnn0z09","date":"2019-07-10T09:26:28Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Colorado"}},{"regret":"Not completing my MBA.","gender":"","id":"R_bvKU86HCIriXQ0J","date":"2019-07-08T19:05:08Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Colorado"}},{"regret":"I should have had therapy sooner","gender":"","id":"R_eRT7Vy0hYo4Zl2Z","date":"2019-07-02T19:56:58Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Colorado"}},{"regret":"Not joining the military. I could have served my country more in a life of active service. I finally came to government service and love my work. I wish I'd started earlier.","gender":"","id":"R_6oiu8fbE28sO20J","date":"2019-06-28T22:33:03Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Colorado"}}],"Hawaii":[{"regret":"That I didn't join the service or go to college.","gender":"","id":"R_9tOH0VtSpJrJCqp","date":"2019-07-21T09:18:31Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Hawaii"}},{"regret":"I regret that I was not introduced to EST or the work of Landmark earlier in my life. My lack of awareness of what I have learned since participating at age 39 certainly impacted my choices and what I could perceive as possible for myself and others prior to that time. I paid a large opportunity cost by missing this training earlier in my life. I have a great, extraordinary life now. All is well.","gender":"","id":"R_d7qEfwr1kXm2pW5","date":"2019-06-26T22:27:47Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Hawaii"}},{"regret":"Marrying my husband","gender":"","id":"R_3jEZDO7jUzkrF2Z","date":"2019-06-24T15:30:19Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Hawaii"}}],"Ohio":[{"regret":"One significant regret I have is not figuring out what my TRUE major in college should have been the first time around...","gender":"","id":"R_5igdbNkdjzFsrVr","date":"2019-07-19T22:10:18Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Ohio"}},{"regret":"I have always been a supporter of LGBTQ causes and the community, but for many years my support was as closeted as were many of my colleagues (I am a cisgender straight white guy).  So I was at an event where my "power" as an senior executive was in play, and I was asked about my position on gay marriage.  I hedged and hemmed and hawed and ended up spitting out some lukewarm response about "contracts" vs embracing a full endorsement.  I edited myself, in other words, and lied about what I truly believed and felt.  I immediately experienced regret and palpably felt the disappointment many in the room felt about what I'd said, people who privately knew what I really believed.  It was a moment in which I felt a betrayal of myself and a violation of one of my core values (Authenticity).  
I have never since that event failed to respond fully when people ask my personal position on any issue. I own what I believe and accept that because of my privilege and rank that my voicing support for minority positions really matters, both for the minority group (women, people of color, LGBTQ, especially) and for the influence I can have on conversations in the larger community","gender":"","id":"R_ealeUHcMLYk0adn","date":"2019-06-28T16:48:50Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Ohio"}},{"regret":"Not dealing with my eating disorder sooner.","gender":"","id":"R_77XuFrusmRpdiU5","date":"2019-06-26T02:04:06Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Ohio"}},{"regret":"Abandoning good friends","gender":"","id":"R_3mj8bAgYpXszNaJ","date":"2019-06-25T23:27:45Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Ohio"}},{"regret":"I wish I had 'sold' myself better when talking to Coach Jerry Kindall about walking on to the University of Arizona baseball team as a freshman. I was intimidated by him being the author of the Sports Illustrated book on baseball in the library. I only answered his direct questions; "yes, sir", " no, sir". I should have told him I already had an AF ROTC scholarship and simply wanted to be a defensive replacement as I was a better defensive outfielder than his starters the previous year. In hindsight, however, graduating with a Math degree was hard enough. Maybe it was a good thing I didn't try to add another commitment.","gender":"","id":"R_bf8UuBBQ0SjqKDr","date":"2019-06-25T15:47:25Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Ohio"}}],"Pennsylvania":[{"regret":"I wish I would have changed my career a few times while I was still at the entry level stage. I feel like I'm pigeon holed now in my current career, but perhaps I could be a great project manager or salesman.","gender":"","id":"R_6P6c42JX6oUlDuJ","date":"2019-07-18T14:25:39Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Pennsylvania"}},{"regret":"I wish I would have ventured out to try other things, like the high school musical or golf or tennis or hockey. I think I would have enjoyed them and performed pretty well","gender":"","id":"R_8tWXnvO0bxRVEl7","date":"2019-07-18T14:03:59Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Pennsylvania"}},{"regret":"I regret not spending more time playing/practicing the piano and simply allowing it to be a priority in my life.","gender":"","id":"R_3dPgseSOwHb7aDP","date":"2019-07-14T11:00:01Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Pennsylvania"}},{"regret":"I regret not learning how to seek help sooner","gender":"","id":"R_5bPYEnRLR4IDU57","date":"2019-07-09T12:56:30Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Pennsylvania"}},{"regret":"Working too hard and investing too much time in training.","gender":"","id":"R_02h64XISXIDv2h7","date":"2019-06-26T21:50:27Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Pennsylvania"}}],"Iowa":[{"regret":"Letting someone else take the blame for my wrongdoing","gender":"","id":"R_4PyciCJWyEJ6Tsx","date":"2019-07-18T00:03:03Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Iowa"}},{"regret":"Thinking I had to get a "real job" right out of college & marriage - we had to prove to our parents we were grown up.  I wish we had taken chances - explored more travel etc   before we settled down with jobs and started our family.","gender":"","id":"R_bHfJbIGTYVG7P5r","date":"2019-06-26T22:33:43Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Iowa"}}],"Maryland":[{"regret":"Not spending more time with my grandfather. He was a tough perfectionist however he was also very smart and interesting. I wish I had been braver around him and gotten to know him rather than just popping in and out. He passed away when I was in my early 20s.","gender":"","id":"R_eyT9OOIfenMsKsB","date":"2019-07-17T00:40:19Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Maryland"}},{"regret":"Not spending more time with my near-death mother when she was in the hospital.","gender":"","id":"R_9ZvSOCBTaIZaKWx","date":"2019-07-10T17:30:13Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Maryland"}},{"regret":"Not valuing myself soon enough - not doing as well as I could have in school (to fit in) which impacted everything and settling for the wrong relationships.","gender":"","id":"R_8HdtNY0tOiukfrv","date":"2019-07-02T01:24:40Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Maryland"}},{"regret":"Two regrets: 

I regret not taking academics more seriously in college. I have a great career and make great money compared to others, but I could have made more opportunities for myself.

Regret not asking for help early in my career. People want to help you. I did not learn to ask for help until I had a few painful professional experiences. I've learned from them :-)","gender":"","id":"R_9AW53ovJHsTb8kl","date":"2019-07-01T19:05:21Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Maryland"}},{"regret":"That I didn't keep contact info for more of the people I met along the way. I didn't read that Bill Clinton kept 3X5 index cards for everyone he met (and look where that got him) until it was too late. And I wish I hadn't gotten married when I got out of the army, moved to Key West and worked as a bartender until I sold my first novel!","gender":"","id":"R_aXfAtChumDjYGhL","date":"2019-06-27T23:01:35Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Maryland"}}],"Massachusetts":[{"regret":"Not sleeping more when I was younger and in that vein having a more strict schedule for myself.  I used to stay up very late probably from elementary school on.","gender":"","id":"R_9ZYZ54o9WgiJBrf","date":"2019-07-16T20:31:08Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Massachusetts"}},{"regret":"I didn't take my wife's mental health issues more seriously before we had children.","gender":"","id":"R_6qToYbpc9BTNkkR","date":"2019-07-02T18:01:52Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Massachusetts"}},{"regret":"I wish I had started my 401k straight out of school.","gender":"","id":"R_4GinwqonqaSwHtj","date":"2019-07-01T21:03:14Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Massachusetts"}},{"regret":"Decision-making focused on fear and failure rather than courage and growth.","gender":"","id":"R_0SAIaOy9e0Kq4MB","date":"2019-06-25T18:23:50Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Massachusetts"}}],"Connecticut":[{"regret":"Following my heart and not my head!","gender":"","id":"R_a5DuuC7QGetXQTb","date":"2019-07-15T05:26:27Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Connecticut"}}],"Quebec":[{"regret":"Not connecting with my grandmother before she passed away. Not getting to know her despite her efforts of trying to get to know me.","gender":"","id":"R_1SxM10UKTzxSrbf","date":"2019-07-14T00:59:13Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Quebec"}}],"Mauritius":[{"regret":"I have not saved enough money during my early adult days and it has a significant repercussion on my finances nowadays.","gender":"","id":"R_e5a3b3IdOnnbeuN","date":"2019-07-10T08:02:10Z","location":{"country":"Mauritius","state":"Port Louis"}}],"New_Jersey":[{"regret":"Not investing money when I was younger.","gender":"","id":"R_4MATAreFzXZrMu9","date":"2019-07-09T20:51:33Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New Jersey"}},{"regret":"Not working earlier in my life to be comfortable with who I am","gender":"","id":"R_4Pf6nb8aflk7dmR","date":"2019-06-26T20:48:14Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"New Jersey"}}],"Ontario":[{"regret":"I spent a lot of time getting messed up- smoking weed and drinking too much. I probably could have done less of that and more time pursuing other hobbies.","gender":"","id":"R_430Jv5QNKsbPHDL","date":"2019-07-09T18:52:21Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Ontario"}},{"regret":"Not having more faith in myself.","gender":"","id":"R_beoavGZ9MMvPWWp","date":"2019-07-08T17:24:24Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Ontario"}},{"regret":"The one significant regret I have was listening to my high-school guidance teacher who used a graph to illustrate the earnings potential of high school, vs. college, vs. university graduates as a means for me to determine what career I should pursue. I was made to believe that money would be the key driver to my career satisfaction, which as a student who earned minimum wage for 8 hours of work a week seemed a good argument at the time. Anyway, went to university for the typical pre-med courses, instead of college for journalism which I had wanted to do, because he told me I was too smart for college. I spent the next 15 years of my life trying to find a job that I wanted to stay in for more than 1 year. When I found out that this guidance counselor had committed suicide 5 years after I graduated high school several years later, I was even more regretful that I didn't follow my own inner voice. My lesson learned was to ensure that I didn't place my failed dreams or expectations on my son's when choosing a career, and they took their time before pursuing more formal education, and they are content and committed to the choices they made for themselves.","gender":"","id":"R_cYN0oow8dmZXokR","date":"2019-07-05T21:31:20Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Ontario"}},{"regret":"I regret not being more confident and comfortable with myself so i could dress the way i wanted and do the things i wanted to do.","gender":"","id":"R_5i0gDqiq2Hpy1Kt","date":"2019-06-30T17:09:52Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Ontario"}}],"Florida":[{"regret":"Getting too drunk on my wedding night","gender":"","id":"R_1KN35UZb1kMcI1n","date":"2019-07-08T02:47:57Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Florida"}},{"regret":"Once, as a child, I made an innocently intended remark that I MUCH later realized must have been extremely hurtful to my Mother. I regret that I made the remark, and also that I never found a way to apologize that wouldn't have made things worse by bringing it up.","gender":"","id":"R_eXyVyIejcFkob3v","date":"2019-07-04T22:06:03Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Florida"}},{"regret":"That I do not have a partner to share my life with.  I am twice divorced and did not try hard enough to find someone new.","gender":"","id":"R_b250TmG9u9yxzKZ","date":"2019-06-28T02:13:45Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Florida"}},{"regret":"Not being more bold, not caring what others think.... Going for it!","gender":"","id":"R_byFl0ezP2R5qWS9","date":"2019-06-25T14:22:32Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Florida"}},{"regret":"Procrastinating things I wanted to do until the time was better. Waiting to travel, to write, to do things I figured I'd eventually do- until I had more money, was older, was wiser, liked myself more. Basically living like I had all the time in the world. There will never be a perfect time to do some things","gender":"","id":"R_73PwkMIHMGcPFwp","date":"2019-06-24T17:50:16Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Florida"}}],"Missouri":[{"regret":"Early in my career (age 22-35), I allowed bad managers to influence how I felt about myself and my work. They held me back from growing and progressing and made me feel that I wasn't measuring up. I wish I had been stronger, bolder, and more confident to stand up to them and call out their terrible management practices, and look for better jobs more quickly instead of staying "for my resume".","gender":"","id":"R_cMjnz5OgfkAk87P","date":"2019-07-08T01:34:24Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Missouri"}},{"regret":"That I didn't get out of a marriage that wasn't making me happy sooner. I was afraid to let go and be alone.","gender":"","id":"R_8AJgvMyqXPKLF65","date":"2019-07-01T13:32:46Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Missouri"}},{"regret":"I wish I would have listened to my instincts more often instead of over ruling them to be "nice".","gender":"","id":"R_3Q1WyhLfuu1wLIN","date":"2019-06-24T22:33:36Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Missouri"}}],"India":[{"regret":"Didn’t trust on gut feelings 14 years back and put all myself to execute it..","gender":"","id":"R_0DqHAPGThAS7VQ1","date":"2019-07-07T13:12:38Z","location":{"country":"India","state":"Tamil Nadu"}}],"South_Carolina":[{"regret":"I wish I had been more willing to fail; that is, I wish I had been bolder in engaging in situations where I was not likely to succeed, for the sake of learning from the experience.","gender":"","id":"R_cHJ0w60Ah0caDYh","date":"2019-07-06T21:18:21Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"South Carolina"}}],"North_Carolina":[{"regret":"I majored in Business for a secure job instead of the English I loved.","gender":"","id":"R_bPbOWnruUU2W5z7","date":"2019-07-05T21:54:42Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"North Carolina"}},{"regret":"Not being bolder and experimenting more with creativity.","gender":"","id":"R_72qT02UoEZjzkBD","date":"2019-06-26T14:10:19Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"North Carolina"}},{"regret":"I regret getting married so young - the first time. (I subsequently divorced and remarried).","gender":"","id":"R_bkqoDWP68O7f7cF","date":"2019-06-26T12:41:32Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"North Carolina"}}],"Sweden":[{"regret":"You know - the funny thing is that I have always regretted a lot of things in my life - but when I got this question from I gave it som serious thought and now I can´t really say that I really regret anything. Now the only thing I can say that I really regret is beeing to harsch on my twin girls when they where kids.","gender":"","id":"R_6gQktEiPrDnHHfv","date":"2019-07-05T09:52:41Z","location":{"country":"Sweden","state":"Stockholm"}},{"regret":"Being concerned about what others think of me.","gender":"","id":"R_41POFrWYQulROOp","date":"2019-06-25T11:26:14Z","location":{"country":"Sweden","state":"Stockholm"}}],"Alberta":[{"regret":"Not consistently following my heart over my mind in some career decisions.","gender":"","id":"R_9Z6Jm8y4Ag7WtV3","date":"2019-07-05T01:18:05Z","location":{"country":"Canada","state":"Alberta"}}],"New_Zealand":[{"regret":"I felt pressured to marry my ex-husband. We should've dated a bit longer before tying the knot.","gender":"","id":"R_3vKaf89ZVWb8wqF","date":"2019-07-03T22:58:41Z","location":{"country":"New Zealand","state":"Wellington"}}],"Netherlands":[{"regret":"Making a career move to Germany (from Holland) which my gut instinct told me not to do. Rational thinking made me decide to do this. 10 months later I was back in Holland having quit the job. I regret it in the sense that i would not do it again, if I was in the same position. But I don't regret it in learning from my decision making and what I find important in the career vs life balance.","gender":"","id":"R_1TGIgUSpXGcucg5","date":"2019-07-03T16:48:38Z","location":{"country":"Netherlands","state":"South Holland"}}],"Germany":[{"regret":"I have never studied  abroad only in Germany. I was 21 and just too lazy. No other good reason.","gender":"","id":"R_exEWtwAOSfs6yhf","date":"2019-06-24T22:12:33Z","location":{"country":"Germany","state":"North Rhine-Westphalia"}}],"Saskatchewan":[{"regret":"Not being open to opportunities that came along when I was on my pre-determined path in University. Fear of failure was holding me back.","gender":"","id":"R_cvBMeHxcPKVLZo9","date":"2019-06-28T18:24:00Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Kansas"}}],"Kentucky":[{"regret":"My biggest regret is screwing up my life to the point that I had to give up my kids. I talk to my daughter every Sunday afternoon. I've talked to my son once in the last two and a half years; he's in a therapeutic boarding school after a suicide attempt. I look back and wonder where everything went wrong.","gender":"","id":"R_2sk3SfD7UmqUm7X","date":"2019-07-02T09:25:47Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Kentucky"}}],"Ireland":[{"regret":"Not quitting that job sooner","gender":"","id":"R_893YnxLimJYvo3z","date":"2019-07-01T16:41:47Z","location":{"country":"Ireland","state":"Leinster"}}],"Indiana":[{"regret":"I regret not having focused my career on one rather obscure topic that I was passionate about and could become a serious expert in over 30 years such that I could feel my expertise is really valuable at the end of my career and would give me as sense of being in demand even as I pass traditional retirement age.","gender":"","id":"R_6xQcNIygYnbGxEN","date":"2019-06-30T21:01:56Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Indiana"}},{"regret":"Making a decision based on what I thought other people might think, instead of basing it on my own feelings.","gender":"","id":"R_abkkJgvyIYBPc69","date":"2019-06-30T19:09:58Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Indiana"}}],"Wisconsin":[{"regret":"Not overcoming my fear of public speaking earlier. By the way, my name is Derek Deprey. Thank you for tweeting my book, SHIFT: Move from Frustrated to Fulfilled a couple of years ago. Meant the world to me. I'm working on a new book called, Rise Above Robo-Bosses: How to Thrive as a Leader in the Digital Era. I'd be honored to be on a Pinkcast. 
Either way, thank you adding value to my life. You are amazing.
Derek Deprey 414.803.2491 or derek@derekdeprey.com","gender":"","id":"R_2srKl4kZIxai9dH","date":"2019-06-28T02:18:12Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Wisconsin"}},{"regret":"After marriage and before the blessings of children arrived, my spouse and I should have traveled more.","gender":"","id":"R_aWRCBqBUhby9iER","date":"2019-06-24T21:46:02Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Wisconsin"}},{"regret":"Not being focused on the things that truly matter in life in my 20s.","gender":"","id":"R_5tZenzz9bb1JFnD","date":"2019-06-24T20:03:58Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Wisconsin"}}],"Washington":[{"regret":"Carolyn T - backing out of a relationship with her","gender":"","id":"R_8hUDn43YTjsp5TD","date":"2019-06-28T01:27:44Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Washington"}},{"regret":"Gaining weight, a few pounds a year, through my life.","gender":"","id":"R_3mkcq0Ue8ENBGuh","date":"2019-06-25T16:48:38Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Washington"}},{"regret":"That I didn't travel abroad sooner, in college or in my 20s. While I'm happy with my life today, I still dream of a parallel universe, where my other self is a graphic novel artist.","gender":"","id":"R_eW0q4XVMzd88gWV","date":"2019-06-26T22:23:55Z","location":{"country":"Italy","state":"Lombardy"}}],"Nevada":[{"regret":"I regret not learning how to listen.","gender":"","id":"R_eDxk3CzijiksNhz","date":"2019-06-26T21:29:41Z","location":{"country":"United States","state":"Nevada"}}],"Greece":[{"regret":"That I listened to people when I was looking for an easy out; and followed their counsel even when I knew it wasn’t the right thing to do.
